posts.name: Johnny's Restaurant
posts.note: Johnny's Restaurant is a modern counter serve dishing out traditional Southern eats, including BBQ, plus classic Greek bites. Recommended by John T. Edge.

posts.name: Manci Antique Club
posts.note: Manci Antique Club is an offbeat option with a bar and outdoor seating for po'boys and other Southern-style sandwiches. From what I surmise from their website they have live music some nights. You need to eat the shrimp or seafood po' boy.
